org.schwering.evi.conf
Class ModuleConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.schwering.evi.conf.ModuleConfiguration
public abstract class ModuleConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Administers the module configuration file. Modules listet in this file are loaded. Each URL must point to a module's URL file.
The format of the file is quite simple: 

 http://www.test.de/module.jar
 file:/home/chs/foobar.jar
 # This is a comment
 # And this class will be loaded directly by the default classloader: 
 # (And thus must be in the classpath when starting the application)
 org.schwering.evi.modules.BlaModule

Because internally a HashSet is used, no URL is stored twice.

Version:
$Id: ModuleConfiguration.java 217 2006-05-27 17:46:44Z schwering $
Author:
Christoph Schwering (schwering@gmail.com)

Field Detail

MODULES_CONFIG_FILE

public static final java.io.File MODULES_CONFIG_FILE
The module list.
It is tried to set it to CONFIG_DIR/modules.

Method Detail

load

public static void load()
Loads the URLs. If an exception is thrown, this method shows an ExceptionDialog. This method also adds a shutdownhook which invokes store().

store

public static void store()
Stores the URL list to the file.
